root.name: Looney Tunes: Carrot Crazy
root.description: In Looney Tunes: Carrot Crazy you take control of either Bugs and Lola to find your carrots that have been stolen by an unknown Looney Tunes character. Bugs and Lola each have their special abilities and you will have to switch between them when necessary to proceed. You access the game's different stages through a Warner Bros. film studio that acts as your hub.
